summary: Provides a unified framework for persisting and accessing annotation data across computer‑vision tasks. It defines an abstract label store interface, configuration helpers, and concrete implementations that read/write labels in GeoJSON or raster formats for chip classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation, along with utilities for format conversion.
business_intent: Facilitates reliable storage, retrieval, and update of ground‑truth and prediction labels within Raster Vision pipelines, allowing seamless integration of GIS‑compatible formats and raster data for model training and inference.
